io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.waveformdata

クラス WaveformDataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.waveformdata.WaveformDataWriter
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class WaveformDataWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
    Writer of BasicDataset and PartialDataset

    This class create a new set of dataset files.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      This constructor is only for BasicID.

      This constructor is only for PartialID.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • WaveformDataWriter

        public WaveformDataWriter(java.nio.file.Path idPath,
                          java.nio.file.Path dataPath,
                          java.util.Set<Station> stationSet,
                          java.util.Set<GlobalCMTID> globalCMTIDSet,
                          double[][] periodRanges)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor is only for BasicID. All write ID must have a station, a Global CMT ID and period ranges in the input ones.
        パラメータ:
        idPath - Path for ID file (must not exist)
        dataPath - Path for data file (must not exist)
        stationSet - must contain all information of the IDs to write
        globalCMTIDSet - must contain all information of the IDs to write
        periodRanges - must contain all information of the IDs to write. If you want to use ranges [10, 30] and [50,100] then the periodRanges should be new double[][]{{10,30},{50,100}}
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs

      • WaveformDataWriter

        public WaveformDataWriter(java.nio.file.Path idPath,
                          java.nio.file.Path dataPath,
                          java.util.Set<Station> stationSet,
                          java.util.Set<GlobalCMTID> globalCMTIDSet,
                          double[][] periodRanges,
                          java.util.Set<Location> perturbationPoints)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor is only for PartialID. All write ID must have a station, a Global CMT ID and period ranges in the input ones.
        パラメータ:
        idPath - Path for ID file (must not exist)
        dataPath - Path for data file (must not exist)
        stationSet - must contain all information of the IDs to write
        globalCMTIDSet - must contain all information of the IDs to write
        periodRanges - must contain all information of the IDs to write. If you want to use ranges [10, 30] and [50,100] then the periodRanges should be new double[][]{{10,30},{50,100}}
        perturbationPoints - must contain all information of the IDs to write
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs

      • addBasicID

        public void addBasicID(BasicID basicID)
                throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        basicID - StartByte will be ignored and set properly in the write file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • addPartialID

        public void addPartialID(PartialID partialID)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        partialID - PartialID must contain waveform data. StartByte will be ignored and set properly in the write file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
